Question: This person moved to Los Angeles and began an 11-year run on The ____ Show which was aired on CBS television from 1967 to 1978.
Hints: In 1966, Lucille Ball became a friend and mentor to this person.
This person was cast in a minor role on The Paul Winchell and Jerry Mahoney Show in 1955.
This person also guest-starred on a number of shows during this time, including The Twilight Zone episode "Cavender is Coming".
